output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, "CMF:11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3 on the ballot).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram with an estimated reach of 500,001-1,000,000 people and actual impressions of 8,000-8,999.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly aims to influence voters by stating that Ciolacu is "the only one who has proven that stability is possible," directly promoting his candidacy.
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content as it makes a direct endorsement without any balanced reporting or factual analysis.
6. Personal opinion: While presented as an opinion, this is a paid advertisement with significant reach and includes a CMF number, making it clear campaign material rather than personal expression.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains an official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement with wide reach - Makes explicit endorsement - Aims to influence voting behavior - Published during the period when presidential campaign propaganda is prohibited
conclusion.message-for-police: MEGASOFT SYSTEMS SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea si promovarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook si Instagram (ID: 2459673824239734) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, ce constituie propaganda electorala in favoarea candidatului ION-MARCEL CIOLACU. Postarea include numarul CMF 11240017, are un caracter electoral explicit prin afirmatia "Stabilitatea este cea mai importantă și singurul care a dovedit că se poate acest lucru este Marcel Ciolacu", vizeaza un public larg (intre 500,001 si 1,000,000 de persoane) si are ca scop influentarea intentiei de vot a alegatorilor in perioada in care propaganda electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale este interzisa prin lege.
